play.classloading

类 ApplicationClasses.ApplicationClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.classloading.ApplicationClasses.ApplicationClass
  • 封闭类:
    ApplicationClasses

    public static class ApplicationClasses.ApplicationClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a application class
